verses.text: Give ear, O Keeper \w of|strong="H0413"\w* Israel, guiding \w Joseph|strong="H0413"\w* \w like|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0413"\w* flock; \w you|strong="H0413"\w* who have \w your|strong="H0413"\w* seat \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* winged ones, let \w your|strong="H0413"\w* glory be seen.

Before Ephraim \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Benjamin \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Manasseh, let \w your|strong="H3478"\w* strength \w be|strong="H3478"\w* awake \w from|strong="H3478"\w* sleep, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* come \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w our|strong="H3478"\w* salvation.

Take \w us|strong="H6440"\w* back \w again|strong="H6440"\w*, O God; let \w us|strong="H6440"\w* see \w the|strong="H0853"\w* shining \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* let \w us|strong="H6440"\w* be safe.

\w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* armies, how \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* wrath \w be|strong="H0430"\w* burning \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rest \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* people?

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w them|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w of|strong="H0430"\w* weeping \w for|strong="H6635"\w* food; \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* drink \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w them|strong="H5704"\w* sorrow \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* measure.

\w You|strong="H0398"\w* make \w us|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* cause \w of|strong="H3899"\w* war among our neighbours; our haters are laughing \w at|strong="H0398"\w* \w us|strong="H8248"\w* among themselves.

\w Take|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* back again, O God \w of|strong="H7760"\w* armies; \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* see \w the|strong="H7760"\w* shining \w of|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* face, \w and|strong="H3932"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* be safe.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* vine \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt: driving \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* nations, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* planting \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1471"\w* made ready \w a|strong="H5193"\w* place \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w*, \w so|strong="H5265"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w* might \w take|strong="H5265"\w* deep root, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w* sent \w out|strong="H5265"\w* its branches \w over|strong="H1471"\w* all \w the|strong="H5193"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H0776"\w* \w covered|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w its|strong="H4390"\w* shade, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* great trees \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w its|strong="H4390"\w* branches.

\w It|strong="H3680"\w* sent out \w its|strong="H3680"\w* arms \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* Sea, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w its|strong="H3680"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* River.

Why \w are|strong="H5104"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* walls broken \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* hands, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* who \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w may|strong="H3220"\w* take \w its|strong="H3220"\w* fruit?

\w It|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* uprooted \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pigs \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woods, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* field get \w their|strong="H3605"\w* food \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H4100"\w*.

Come back, O God \w of|strong="H7704"\w* armies: \w from|strong="H7704"\w* heaven let your eyes be turned \w to|strong="H7704"\w* this vine, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* give your mind \w to|strong="H7704"\w* \w it|strong="H3765"\w*,

Even \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* tree \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* planted \w by|strong="H6485"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* right hand, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* branch \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w made|strong="H6485"\w* strong \w for|strong="H6635"\w* yourself.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* burned \w with|strong="H5921"\w* fire; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0553"\w* waste \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* face.

Let \w your|strong="H6440"\w* hand be \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H0784"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* right hand, \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H0784"\w* whom \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H8313"\w* strong \w for|strong="H0784"\w* yourself.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* we \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* back \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*; keep \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* life, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* we \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* praise \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* name.

Take \w us|strong="H7121"\w* \w back|strong="H5472"\w*, \w O|strong="H8034"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w armies|strong="H3808"\w*; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7121"\w* see \w the|strong="H4480"\w* shining \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* face, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* safe.
